channel.title: Topic on Rico.ai
channel.description: Recent content in Topic on Rico.ai

item.title: ROS Topic
item.description: rostopic list rosmsg list Publisher Publish messages into a topic import rospy from geometry_msgs.msg import Twist rospy.init_node('robot_mover') pub = rospy.Publisher('/cmd_move', Twist, queue_size=1) # 2 Hz rate = rospy.Rate(2) move = Twist() move.linear.x = 0.5 # Move forward on x 0.5 move.angular.z = 0.5 # Move at an anglular rate of 0.5 while not rospy.is_shutdown(): pub.publish(move) # Publish the move rate.sleep() # Maintain the refresh rate Subscriber Read messages from a topic
